A. Kahuna possesses super strength.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships between Biscane, Kahuna, and Archie?
Options:
A. a) Biscane is the older brother of Kahuna.
B. b) Archie is Kahuna's cousin.
C. c) Kahuna possesses super strength.
D. d) Archie is the older brother of Biscane.
Correct Answer: a) Biscane is the older brother of Kahuna. and b) Archie is Kahuna's cousin. and c) Kahuna possesses super strength.
